common.desc: The multisite subscription, with no commitment.

support.unlock: Support our website, get your Multipass

locking.warning: The rest of this article is restricted.

end_of_article.title: You can keep on reading...
end_of_article.sentence_1: ...but we need you to hear this: more people are reading our website than ever but advertising revenues across the media are falling fast.
end_of_article.sentence_2: We want to keep our content as open as we can. We are independent, and our quality work takes a lot of time, money and hard work to produce.
end_of_article.sentence_3: You can support us with Multipass which enables you to pay for a bundle of websites: you can finance the work of journalists and content creators you love.

end_of_article.title: You can keep on reading...
end_of_article.sentence_1: ...but we need you to hear this: more people are reading our website than ever but advertising revenues across the media are falling fast.
end_of_article.sentence_2: We want to keep our content as open as we can. We are independent, and our quality work takes a lot of time, money and hard work to produce.

support.unlock: Soutenez notre site grâce à Multipass

end_of_article.title: L'article est terminé ...
end_of_article.sentence_1: ... mais nous avons besoin que vous lisiez ceci: nous avons de plus en plus de lecteurs chaque jour, mais de moins en moins de revenus publicitaires.
end_of_article.sentence_2: Nous souhaitons laisser notre contenu accessible à tous. Nous sommes indépendants et notre travail de qualité prend beaucoup de temps, d'argent et de dévotion.
end_of_article.sentence_3: Vous pouvez nous soutenir avec Multipass qui permet de payer pour un bouquet de sites, et ainsi financer le travail des créateurs et journalistes que vous aimez.
